Program calculates concentration per debtor/client and stores results in CONC
Note that complications in the DEBC/DEBH relation may cause a different result
than expected.if a DEBH number is assigned to multiple DEBC rows (of 1 client)
-debtor balances for concentration are calculated on DEBH level
-concentrtion limits may be issued on DEBC level
Therefore a CONC row is stored only for the first DEBC row per DEBH/CLNT
with excess concentration
25.01.2006 CO: Default for Runtype, if not filled

only if PI.RUNTIME=1

virtuals DEBC/DEBH for use in Group Suffix
reset DEBH level fields

-- calc total balance for CONC_ACTINVAFACACCC
